name: Bali
description: A tropical paradise known for its stunning beaches, ancient temples, and vibrant culture.

name: Dubai
description: A modern metropolis in the desert, famous for its luxury shopping, ultramodern architecture, and lively nightlife.

name: Thailand
description: A Southeast Asian country known for its tropical beaches, opulent royal palaces, ancient ruins, and ornate temples.

name: Singapore
description: A modern city-state and island country in Southeast Asia, known for its multicultural population and clean environment.

name: Malaysia
description: A Southeast Asian country occupying parts of the Malay Peninsula and the island of Borneo.

name: Maldives
description: A tropical nation in the Indian Ocean composed of 26 ring-shaped atolls, which are made up of more than 1,000 coral islands.

name: Andaman
description: A group of islands in the Bay of Bengal, known for their pristine beaches, coral reefs, and tropical rainforests.

name: Vietnam
description: A Southeast Asian country known for its beaches, rivers, Buddhist pagodas, and bustling cities.
